SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:if &UC4RB_DISPLAY# = "fileset" : set &mode# = "-L" :endif
:if &UC4RB_DISPLAY# = "prerequisites" : set &mode# = "-p" :endif
:if &UC4RB_DISPLAY# = "dependent" : set &mode# = "-d" :endif
:if &UC4RB_DISPLAY# = "installed files" : set &mode# = "-f" :endif
:if &UC4RB_DISPLAY# = "update history" : set &mode# = "-h" :endif
:if &UC4RB_DISPLAY# = "owning fileset" : set &mode# = "-w" :endif
echo "### begin lslpp output ###" output=`lslpp 2>&1 -cq &mode# "&UC4RB_SEARCH_FILESET#"` rc=$? echo "$output" echo "### end lslpp output ###"
if [ $rc -eq 0 ]; then exit 0 fi
if echo "$output" | grep -q "Fileset .* not installed"; then exit 0 fi
exit $rc

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &variableName# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_AIX.PRV.VARA.TEMP.QUERY_RESULT.&$ACTIVATOR_RUNID#.&$PHYS_DATE_YYYYMMDD#" :SET &variablePath# = "" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CREATE_PASS_VALUES_VARIABLE :SET &output# = 0
:SET &cnt# = 0 :SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "*") :PROCESS &hnd# : set &line# = get_process_line(&hnd#) : if &line# = "### end lslpp output ###" : set &output# = 0 : endif : if &output# = 1 : set &cnt# = add(&cnt#, 1) : put_var &variableName#, &cnt#, &line# : endif : if &line# = "### begin lslpp output ###" : set &output# = 1 : endif :ENDPROCESS :PSET &UC4RB_OUT_AIX_QUERY# = "&variableName#"
